author: alexoree
msg: Juddi Gui updates, added partial support for internationalization with languages for english and spanish. Not all pages are tokenized yet. refactoring and a few new features

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-4637. INodeDirectory#replaceSelf4Quota may incorrectly convert a newly created directory to an INodeDirectoryWithSnapshot. Contributed by Jing Zhao

author: robbie
msg: QPID-4676: change External auth provider to create usernames of the form <CN>@<DC1>.<DC2>....<DCN> by default
- Allows for use of SSL Client Authentication in manner more consistent with the C++ broker
- Adds 'useFullDN' attribute to the auth provider to allow enabling use of the old behaviour
